Banner.Title: Cookie Management
Banner.Description: Our site only uses two types of cookies essential for the site to function, and no advertising or tracking cookies:

CookieTypes.Essential: • An essential and mandatory cookie for the technical operation of the site
CookieTypes.Session: • A session cookie, optional but necessary to log into your account

Banner.NoTracking: We respect your privacy: no advertising or tracking cookies are used.

Functional.Title: Functional Cookie (required)
Functional.Description: This cookie contains a token. With this token, your login session can be resumed even after the 2-hour session cookie validity period. This cookie is only set if you have activated the 'Stay logged in' option when logging in. This cookie is removed when you log out.
Functional.Label: Essential cookie

Session.Title: Session Cookie
Session.Description: This cookie contains a token. With this token, your current session can be continued while using the site. This cookie is valid for 2 hours after creation and is renewed each time you change pages on this site.
Session.Label: Session cookie

Cookies.SessionWarning: Warning: Without session cookies, you will not be able to log into your account.
